content:
In the morning, Russian troops from the temporarily occupied left bank were fired several times by Kherson. There were hits, in particular, in residential buildings, administrative buildings in the central part of the city.

About thisinformsHead of Kherson City Military Administration Roman Mrochko.

“About an hour ago, a 42-year-old man was injured as a result of hostile shelling. It is currently tasted. The examination takes place. The preliminary diagnosis is a mine-explosive injury, ”he wrote.

Also Roman Mrochkoaddedthat another wounded was taken to the hospital as a result of a recent hostile shelling of Kherson. The 49-year-old man is a mine-explosive injury. It is currently being fired.

As reported by the Armyinform, Rosarmia attackedThe civilian population of Kherson region, are dead and wounded.
title: Russia was attacked by Kherson again: is known about two wounded
description: Roman Mrochko, the head of the Kherson City Military Administration, informs about it. ...
author: Army Inform
